Unicorn Factory



Find Out More

Free technical training by Unicorn Factory Melbourne

Love tinkering with open source software? Want to sharpen your tech skills and get mentored by Melbourne’s finest? Come along to one of our free technical training workshops and pick a challenge that’s right for you. You can pick something easy, like setting up your own Wordpress blog on a server, or you can pick something harder, like setting up an email server. We have challenges for Vagrant, Packer, Docker, Linux, AWS and more, so if you’re looking to get more technical skills but not sure where to start, this is the place to be.

Recommended experience level

You should be comfortable on the command line and be able to use Google to find solutions to problems.

What to bring

A laptop running an operating you are comfortable with. Windows is fine. Mac OS X is better. Linux is even better – but only if you’re comfortable with Linux!

Where and when


Dates: Thu 22 June, Mon 26 June, Mon 3 July and Thu 6 July.
Times: 6pm to 10pm.
Location: TBA

Free beer

Free pizza

Free desk with power

Free, super-fast internet connection via Wifi

Free access to AWS

Free mentors to help you if you get stuck

Each workshop has a maximum capacity of only 14 places – so be quick to register your interest! To register, we’d like to know (in 100 words or less) what you think of the following statement:

“It’s better to specialise in one thing than be a generalist across many things.”

Register here via Meetup
